1.name: Pretty in Pink
1.description: A poor girl must choose between the affections of dating her childhood sweetheart or a rich but sensitive playboy.

2.name: Top Gun
2.description: As students at the United States Navy's elite fighter weapons school compete to be best in the class, one daring young pilot learns a few things from a civilian instructor that are not taught in the classroom.

3.name: Stand by Me
3.description: After the death of a friend, a writer recounts a boyhood journey to find the body of a missing boy.

4.name: Aliens
4.description: Ellen Ripley is rescued by a deep salvage team after being in hypersleep for 57 years. The moon that the Nostromo visited has been colonized, but contact is lost. This time, colonial marines have impressive firepower, but will that be enough?

5.name: Ferris Bueller's Day Off
5.description: A high school wise guy is determined to have a day off from school, despite what the Principal thinks of that.

6.name: Platoon
6.description: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.

7.name: Highlander
7.description: An immortal Scottish swordsman must confront the last of his immortal opponent, a murderously brutal barbarian who lusts for the fabled "Prize".

8.name: Labyrinth
8.description: A 16-year-old girl is given 13 hours to solve a labyrinth and rescue her baby brother when her wish for him to be taken away is granted by the Goblin King.

9.name: Big Trouble in Little China
9.description: A rough-and-tumble trucker helps rescue his friend's fiance from an ancient sorcerer in a supernatural battle beneath Chinatown.

10.name: Blue Velvet
10.description: The discovery of a severed human ear found in a field leads a young man on an investigation related to a beautiful, mysterious nightclub singer and a group of psychopathic criminals who have kidnapped her child.

11.name: Critters
11.description: A group of small, furry aliens makes lunch out of the locals in a farming town.

12.name: Flight of the Navigator
12.description: In 1978, a boy travels 8 years into the future and has an adventure with an intelligent, wisecracking alien ship.

13.name: Manhunter
13.description: Former FBI profiler Will Graham returns to service to pursue a deranged serial murderer named "the Tooth Fairy" by the media.

14.name: The Fly
14.description: A brilliant but eccentric scientist begins to transform into a giant man/fly hybrid after one of his experiments goes horribly wrong.

15.name: Nine 1/2 Weeks
15.description: A woman gets involved in an impersonal affair with a man. She barely knows about his life, only about the sex games they play, so the relationship begins to get complicated.

16.name: Crocodile Dundee
16.description: An American reporter goes to the Australian outback to meet an eccentric crocodile poacher and invites him to New York City.

17.name: Short Circuit
17.description: Number 5 of a group of experimental robots in a lab is electrocuted, suddenly becomes intelligent, and escapes.

18.name: Back to School
18.description: To help his discouraged son get through college, a funloving and obnoxious rich businessman decides to enter the school as a student himself.

19.name: Little Shop of Horrors
19.description: A nerdy florist finds his chance for success and romance with the help of a giant man-eating plant who demands to be fed.

20.name: Youngblood
20.description: A skilled young hockey prospect hoping to attract the attention of professional scouts is pressured to show that he can fight if challenged during his stay in a Canadian minor hockey town. ...                See full summary »

21.name: Hoosiers
21.description: A coach with a checkered past and a local drunk train a small town high school basketball team to become a top contender for the championship.

22.name: An American Tail
22.description: While emigrating to the United States, a young Russian mouse gets separated from his family and must relocate them while trying to survive in a new country.

23.name: Howard the Duck
23.description: A sarcastic humanoid duck is pulled from his homeworld to Earth where he must stop a hellish alien invasion with the help of a nerdy scientist and a cute struggling female rock singer who fancies him.

24.name: The Money Pit
24.description: A young couple struggles to repair a hopelessly dilapidated house.

25.name: The Wraith
25.description: After a young man is murdered by a road-racing gang of motor-heads, a mysterious fast-driving spirit descends from the sky to take revenge.

26.name: The Karate Kid Part II
26.description: Daniel accompanies his mentor, Mr. Miyagi, to Miyagi's childhood home in Okinawa. Miyagi visits his dying father and confronts his old rival, while Daniel falls in love and inadvertently makes a new rival of his own.

27.name: The Hitcher
27.description: A young man who escapes the clutches of a murderous hitch-hiker is subsequently stalked by the hitcher and framed for his crimes.

28.name: Children of a Lesser God
28.description: A new speech teacher at a school for the deaf falls in love with the janitor, a deaf woman speechless by choice.

29.name: Cobra
29.description: A tough-on-crime street cop must protect the only surviving witness to a strange murderous cult with far reaching plans.

30.name: The Color of Money
30.description: Fast Eddie Felson teaches a cocky but immensely talented protégé the ropes of pool hustling, which in turn inspires him to make an unlikely comeback.

31.name: Invaders from Mars
31.description: A boy tries to stop aliens who have taken over his town and are attempting to brainwash its inhabitants.

32.name: Der Name der Rose
32.description: An intellectually nonconformist friar investigates a series of mysterious deaths in an isolated abbey.

33.name: The Mission
33.description: Eighteenth century Spanish Jesuits try to protect a remote South American tribe in danger of falling under the rule of pro-slavery Portugal.

34.name: Troll
34.description: A wicked troll king in search of a mystical ring that will transform him to human form invades a San Francisco apartment complex where a powerful witch lives.

35.name: Iron Eagle
35.description: A young pilot plans a rescue mission when his father, an Air Force Colonel, is shot down over enemy territory and captured.

36.name: Hannah and Her Sisters
36.description: Between two Thanksgivings two years apart, Hannah's husband falls in love with her sister Lee, while her hypochondriac ex-husband rekindles his relationship with her sister Holly.

37.name: Maximum Overdrive
37.description: A group of people try to survive when machines start to come alive and become homicidal.

38.name: ¡Three Amigos!
38.description: Three actors accept an invitation to a Mexican village to perform their onscreen bandit fighter roles, unaware that it is the real thing.

39.name: The Golden Child
39.description: A private detective specializing in missing children is charged with the task of finding a special child who dark forces want to eliminate.

40.name: Star Trek IV: The Voyage Home
40.description: To save Earth from an alien probe, Admiral James T. Kirk and his fugitive crew go back in time to San Francisco in 1986 to retrieve the only beings who can communicate with it: humpback whales.

41.name: Tenkû no shiro Rapyuta
41.description: A young boy and a girl with a magic crystal must race against pirates and foreign agents in a search for a legendary floating castle.

42.name: Raw Deal
42.description: A former FBI agent turned small-town sheriff agrees to help the FBI chief infiltrate the Chicago mafia when the FBI chief's son is killed by them.

43.name: Chopping Mall
43.description: Eight teenagers are trapped after hours in a high-tech shopping mall and pursued by three murderous security robots out of control.

44.name: Sid and Nancy
44.description: The relationship between Sid Vicious, bassist for British punk group Sex Pistols, and his girlfriend Nancy Spungen is portrayed.

45.name: Peggy Sue Got Married
45.description: Peggy Sue faints at a high school reunion. When she wakes up, she finds herself in her own past, just before she finished school.

46.name: Lucas
46.description: A socially inept fourteen year old experiences heartbreak for the first time when his two best friends -- Cappie, an older-brother figure, and Maggie, the new girl with whom he is in love -- fall for each other.

47.name: Stewardess School
47.description: A typical 80's teen pseudo-sex comedy. A group of varied misfits (including a former prostitute/stripper and a bumbler who can't see more than 6 inches in front of his face) enter a school ...                See full summary »

48.name: The Clan of the Cave Bear
48.description: A young Cro-Magnon woman is raised by Neanderthals.

49.name: SpaceCamp
49.description: The young attendees of a space camp find themselves in space for real when their shuttle is accidentally launched into orbit.

50.name: 37°2 le matin
50.description: A lackadaisical handyman and aspiring novelist tries to support his younger girlfriend as she slowly succumbs to madness.
